reference.Refstring: Tiwari, S., & Gupta, A. (2020). Use case specifications: How complete are they?. Journal of Software: Evolution and Process, 32(1), e2218.

descriptions.definition: "The completeness of the use case specification can be depicted in the sense of coverage (“do they cover every function that they should?”), and some structural completeness (“do they have all the required pieces?”)."
